docs.snippet: Former President Bill Clinton portrayed his wife Hillary on Tuesday as a dynamic force for change and a longtime fighter for social justice as he made a case for her historic 2016 bid for the White House....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former President Bill Clinton portrayed his wife Hillary on Tuesday as a dynamic force for change and a longtime fighter for social justice as he made a case for her historic 2016 bid for the White House.

headline.main: Bill Clinton Portrays Hillary as 'Change-Maker' in Speech to Democrats

docs.snippet: There have been millions of words, decades of video and reams of commentary devoted to the story of Bill and Hillary Clinton. It's been dissected, defended and decried at kitchen tables and on cable news, in tabloids and classrooms....

docs.snippet: Republican Donald Trump on Wednesday invited Russia to dig up tens of thousands of "missing" emails from Hillary Clinton's time at the U.S. State Department, vexing intelligence experts and prompting Democrats to accuse him of urging foreigners to...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican Donald Trump on Wednesday invited Russia to dig up tens of thousands of "missing" emails from Hillary Clinton's time at the U.S. State Department, vexing intelligence experts and prompting Democrats to accuse him of urging foreigners to spy on Americans.

headline.main: Trump Draws Ire After Urging Russia to Find 'Missing' Clinton Emails

docs.snippet: Things changed for Alba Somoza after her sister Anastasia, then 9, told President Clinton that Alba wasn’t getting a fair education....
docs.lead_paragraph: Things changed for Alba Somoza after her sister Anastasia, then 9, told President Clinton that Alba wasn’t getting a fair education.
docs.abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column highlights mission of twin sisters Alba an Anastasia Somoza, who were born prematurely in New York City with cerebral palsy and spastic quadriplegia and now have become advocates for those with disabilities; Anastasia, who is verbal, spoke at Democratic National Convention, while Alba, who needs computer assistance to speak, gives regular college lectures.

headline.main: For Twin Sisters, a Road to Progress That Began by Bending a President’s Ear
headline.print_headline: For Twin Sisters, a Path to Progress That Began by Bending a President’s Ear

docs.snippet: Michael Bloomberg, elected mayor of New York City as a Republican, offered a forceful denunciation of fellow New York billionaire Donald Trump on Wednesday at the Democratic convention, describing the GOP presidential nominee as a "risky, reckless...
docs.lead_paragraph: Michael Bloomberg, elected mayor of New York City as a Republican, offered a forceful denunciation of fellow New York billionaire Donald Trump on Wednesday at the Democratic convention, describing the GOP presidential nominee as a "risky, reckless, and radical choice."

headline.main: Bloomberg Warns of Trump Economic Plans at Dem Convention
headline.print_headline: Bloomberg Warns of Trump Economic Plans at Dem Convention

docs.snippet: The historic unpopularity of Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton may make voters take a harder look at the Libertarian candidate, Gary Johnson, and the Green Party candidate, Jill Stein....
docs.abstract: The historic unpopularity of Donald Trump and Hillary Clinton may make voters take a harder look at the Libertarian candidate, Gary Johnson, and the Green Party candidate, Jill Stein.

headline.main: Could Third Parties Determine This Election?

docs.snippet: His own legacy on the line, President Barack Obama implored Americans to elect Hillary Clinton to the White House, casting her as a candidate who believes in the optimism that drives the nation's democracy and warning against the "deeply pessimist...
docs.lead_paragraph: His own legacy on the line, President Barack Obama implored Americans to elect Hillary Clinton to the White House, casting her as a candidate who believes in the optimism that drives the nation's democracy and warning against the "deeply pessimistic vision" of Republican Donald Trump.

headline.main: Obama Boosts Clinton: Carry Her Like You Carried Me

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama painted an optimistic picture of America's future in a rousing speech on Wednesday that offered full-hearted support to Hillary Clinton in her campaign to defeat Republican Donald Trump and become the first woman elected U.S...
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama painted an optimistic picture of America's future in a rousing speech on Wednesday that offered full-hearted support to Hillary Clinton in her campaign to defeat Republican Donald Trump and become the first woman elected U.S. president.

headline.main: In Contrast to Trump, Obama Lays Out Optimistic Vision for the U.S.
